QuestData.Title: A Very Special Cloth
QuestData.Description: Warbringer O'mrogg has killed more brave soldiers than any enemy I've ever encountered. He is ruthless, cunning, and extremely powerful.$B$BTake him down and bring me his warcloth so that we may fashion it into a banner and show them the fury of the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Warbringer O'mrogg and bring his warcloth to Stone Guard Stok'ton inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you bring me the cloth?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. This will show those blood crazed monsters what they're up against.
